Module edu.citadel.cprl
Package edu.citadel.cprl.ast

Class SingleVarDecl

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.AST
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.Declaration
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.InitialDecl
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.SingleVarDecl
All Implemented Interfaces:
VariableDecl
public final class SingleVarDecl extends InitialDecl implements VariableDecl
The abstract syntax tree node for a single variable declaration. A single variable declaration has the form var x : Integer; Note: A variable declaration where more than one variable is declared is simply a container for multiple single variable declarations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    SingleVarDecl(Token identifier, Type varType, ConstValue initialValue, ScopeLevel scopeLevel)
    Construct a single variable declaration with its identifier, type, initial value, and scope level.
